column5: New Home - 2 Bedroom - 2 full Bathrooms - Large 2 car Garage - Please note our property is Pet Free and Non Smoking - Open Kitchen / Dining / Living area - Tall Stone block fenced back yard with patio and newly constructed 12 X 10 pergola, with patio table and chairs to enjoy our cool evenings. Visit to Palo Duro Canyon State Park / Musical Texas / Zip line.
column8: NEW Southwest House in The Vineyards of Amarillo
